page.title: 10LINKS WITH TRURO
page.content: Our survey area is not more than two miles away from Truro at its furthest point.Most people who live in the area make a great deal of use of the facilities to be found in Truro.It is a good shopping centre,having several supermarkets,specialist shops large and small and a covered market. There is a cinema,cathedral and large cattle market. People who wish to travel long distances can catch trains and coaches at the stations in Truro. Many people who live in Trispen and St.Erme work in Truro. Many clubs and societies not held in our village are held in Truro,for example ballet classes,scouts,boys and girls brigade and red cross meetings. Having Truro near improves the quality of most of our lives.
